titles.title: Expressing support for dancing as a form of valuable exercise and of artistic expression, and for the designation of July 25, 2015, "National Dance Day".

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of National Dance Day to celebrate and encourage the national commitment to dance, dance education, and physical fitness.
Acknowledges that dance is making an important contribution to health by encouraging physical fitness and reducing overweight and obesity.
Commends Nigel Lythgoe for his leadership in promoting National Dance Day.
